q: Aaron Rodgers was all smiles yesterday as a guest on`` Late Show with David Letterman .'' David Letterman handed Aaron Rodgers his WWE championship belt and even caught a pass across the stage from the Super Bowl MVP. There must be a lot of Wisconsin people out there, Aaron Rodgers said as his eyes scanned the crowd, which was met with cheers from the probable Packer backers in attendance. David Letterman asked a series of light-hearted questions, with Aaron Rodgers willingly playing along.

As executive chairman,`` a lot of my time'' will be devoted to dealing with regulators and other government officials, Eric Schmidt said. We've got very complicated government issues, he said, adding that`` we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale.'' begins its story with Donald Rumsfeld 's account about being told by President Bush , two weeks after the 9/11 attacks, to prepare review the Pentagon's plans for a war with Iraq. According to the Times: Two weeks after the worst terrorist attack in our nation's history, those of us in the Department of Defense were fully occupied, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld recalls. by a flu, Allen Iverson had a season-low 12 points and missed 15 of 19 shots in a loss to Indiana on Friday night. He had 13 points in the first quarter against Atlanta, and kept scoring.
